data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Balkenohl, Michael, Pellegrini, Thais Giovannini, Zampaulo, Robson De Almeida (2018): A peculiar new beetle from Brazil associated with a cave habitat (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Clivinini). Zootaxa 4497 (3): 398-410, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4497.3.4|2 occurrences
